price: Lord of the heavens and earth and all that is between them, if only you had sure faith.
arabic: رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَآۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: rabbi al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā in kuntum mūqinīna
